definition: to tease/to make fun of/to provoke/to stir up (trouble)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with

sentences.english: I was too keyed up and the whole process seemed too holy.
sentences.chinese: 我把自己的调弄太高了，整个过程显得太神圣了。

sentences.english: She adjusted her coloured head scarf fussily…
sentences.chinese: 她不厌其烦地调弄着自己的彩色头巾。

definition: to move to and fro (with hand, foot, stick etc)/to fiddle with/to stir up
lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
to provoke/to entice/to lure/to tantalize/to tease/to titillate
delicate hands/woman's tender and soft hands
to chant/to recite rhythmically/to polish verse
to tangle with/to get involved/to pester
to order people about/to stir up/to sow discord
